title: How Can We Pay Off Our House More Quickly? (Hour 2)
description:
Ken Coleman & George Kamel discuss:

Using the emergency fund to pay for schooling,

How to pay off your home more quickly,

When it's time to sell the Tesla,

Letting a family member pay off your debt,

Burnout at work.


Support Our Sponsor:

NetSuite

Zander Insurance


Have a question for the show? Call 888-825-5225 Weekdays from 2-5pm CT

Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
